data.title: Engage Anywhere
data.meta_description: Looking to expand your business operations into Niger? Simplify the process with our Employer of Record services.
data.text: New Year’s Day - January 1; Easter Monday - Date subject to change every year; National Day of Concorde - April 24; Labor Day - May 1; Independence Day - August 3; Republic Day - December 18; Christmas - December 25; Day after the ‘Night of Destiny’ - Date subject to change every year; Eid-ul-Fitr - Date subject to change every year; Feast of Tabaski - Date subject to change every year; Birthday of Prophet Muhammad - Date subject to change every year; Muslim New Year - Date subject to change every year.
